member_organisations:
- Nicoventures Holdings Ltd. (part of British American Tobacco group) 
- Imperial Tobacco Ltd. 
- Japan Tobacco International S.A. 
- Philip Morris International Management S.A.
fields_of_interest: Business and Industry, Environment, Single market, Public Health
head_office_address: c/o Mayer Brown LLP 52 Avenue des Arts
eu_initiatives: Implementation of REACH and the CLP Regulation with regard to e-cigarettes and refill containers, and substances and mixtures contained therein.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: eCIP does not belong to any association.
goals__remit:
The objective of the eCIP is to facilitate and achieve compliance with REACH and the CLP Regulation of companies involved in the manufacturing of e-cigarettes and refill containers.  
 
The eCIP members act in full compliance with EU competition law.
